price: Vuga (yewe Muhamadi) uti “Ni gute musenga (ibigirwamana) mu cyimbo cya Allah, nyamara bidashobora kugira icyo bibatwara cyangwa ngo bigire icyo bibungura? Kandi Allah ni Uwumva bihebuje, Umumenyi uhebuje.”
arabic: قُلۡ أَتَعۡبُدُونَ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ مَا لَا يَمۡلِكُ لَكُمۡ ضَرّٗا وَلَا نَفۡعٗاۚ وَٱللَّهُ هُوَ ٱلسَّمِيعُ ٱلۡعَلِيمُ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: qul ataʿbudūna min dūni al-lahi mā lā yamliku lakum ḍarran walā nafʿan wal-lahu huwa al-samīʿu al-ʿalīmu
